page.title: 14A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SIMON
page.content: During the week I get up at 7am and make my own breakfast.I then get ready for school and read or play until I go for the school bus at 8.30am.School begins at 9.00am. We have break at 10.35am and lunch from 12noon until 1.00pm. We then have lessons until 3.25pm. On Tuesdays instead of lessons we go swimming between 10.50 and 11.30am. When school finishes I go home by school bus. At home I change out of my uniform, have my tea and watch television until 5.00pm. After that I practise my brass instrument for half an hour. I play in my bedroom or outside until 7 or 8pm.I usually read until 8.30pm but sometimes stay up later to watch certain television programmes.
